plot: Sound artist and self-described mystic Sam Ashley tells the story of his trip to the Amazon in the 1980's to try to find 'the real shamanism.' Instead he ended up on the run, in a nightmare...
title: A Fish Clinging to Water
plot_es: Sound artist and self-described mystic Sam Ashley tells the story of his trip to the Amazon in the 1980's to try to find 'the real shamanism.' Instead he ended up on the run, in a nightmare...
plot_en: Sound artist and self-described mystic Sam Ashley tells the story of his trip to the Amazon in the 1980's to try to find 'the real shamanism.' Instead he ended up on the run, in a nightmare...
